explains: n. 直觉力；直觉感知，直觉知识
wordGroup: intellectual intuition 智的直觉；理智的直观

sentences.en: Her tact and intuition never failed.
sentences.cn: 她的得体和直觉从不出错。

sentences.en: Her intuition was telling her that something was wrong.
sentences.cn: 她的直觉在告诉她事情有些不对头。

sentences.en: It's unlikely that a patient website will have such intuition.
sentences.cn: 病人网站不太可能有这样的直觉。
